channel.title: Home on Sean Neilan
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Sean Neilan

item.title: A Tiny LLM That Calls Itself
item.description: A tiny local LLM writes code to scrape a website, then calls itself to summarize what it found.

item.title: Fine-Tuning a Local LLM with LoRA
item.description: Train TinyLlama to know its favorite color using LoRA fine-tuning.

item.title: Replacing Pencil and Paper with Latex for Math
item.description: Can math be done without pencil and paper? Yes.

item.title: Hello World Python AWS Lambda
item.description: Step by step tutorial to create a AWS Python Lambda function.

item.title: About

item.title: Interests
item.description:
I write software for work and for fun! I’m always interested in building new systems, big or small. Here is small sample of software I have recently constructed just for fun. Feel free to check it out!

Big Number Names
Compute the name of any number up to infinity

Art For All
Text your first and last name to +1 (312) 635-4223 for a unique digital artwork made specifically for you based on a proprietary algorithm.

item.title: Snippets
item.description: I make a lot of code snippets to help me write software. This search bar indexes them with minisearch.js. Explore what I’ve written by typing anything below. Try “postgres” or “python”.
